UserPoolName.description: The name of the Cognito user pool.
UserPoolName.title: User Pool Name

HostedZoneDomain.description: The domain name of the Route 53 hosted zone that the cognito domain should be added to.
HostedZoneDomain.title: Hosted Zone Domain

CognitoDomain.description: The domain where Cognito will be deployed to
CognitoDomain.title: Cognito Domain

CookieDomain.description: The domain that cookies will be set for. Consider starting the domain with a '.' if API hosted on subdomain, e.g. set to '.yourdomain.com' if your API is hosted on 'api.yourdomain.com'.
CookieDomain.title: Cookie Domain

CookieSameSite.description: Value for the 'SameSite' attribute for the cookie. 'None' is recommend if your API is hosted on a different subdomain.
CookieSameSite.title: Cookie SameSite

CallbackUrl.description: URL that users should be redirected to after a successful login.
CallbackUrl.title: Callback URL
